prompts.text:
1. Simply hit "Queue Prompt", and this will save the two CLIP text encoders wrapped in the "sd_xl_base_1.0.safetensors" file to ComfyUI/output/clip/.
2. Move the .safetensors file to ComfyUI/models/clip.

3. Use the TE that has "g" (CLIP ViT-G) in clip_name1 (SDXL text encoder 1 out of 2).
4. You can replace the "l" (CLIP ViT-L) in clip_name2 (SDXL text encoder 2 out of 2) with my custom fine-tuned model.

https://huggingface.co/zer0int/CLIP-GmP-ViT-L-14/blob/main/ViT-L-14-GmP-ft-TE-only-HF-format.safetensors

You need *both* text encoders for SDXL, alas use this node in your workflow, and you're good to go! 
You can find this node at: Right click -> Add Node -> Advanced -> Loaders -> DualCLIPLoader
